description: Disabled MCP servers - saved for future re-enabling

playwright.reason: E2E testing not needed until Week 8

parallel-search.reEnableIf: Need multi-source search aggregation (Tavily, Perplexity, Exa, Brave)

parallel-task.reEnableIf: Need multi-agent workflow coordination or complex automation pipelines

puppeteer.reEnableIf: Need PDF generation or prefer Puppeteer API over Playwright

autonomous-browser-tools.reason: High token cost (~3k), browser DevTools is more efficient for debugging
autonomous-browser-tools.reEnableIf: Need Chrome DevTools Protocol automation or live debugging features

21st-magic.reason: Generates React/Vue/Svelte components, not relevant for Node.js/TypeScript backend
21st-magic.reEnableIf: Migrating frontend to React/Vue/Svelte or building component library

activeServers.supabase: Essential - Database operations, migrations, SQL queries, RLS policies
activeServers.vercel: Essential - Deployment, monitoring, build logs, environment variables
